alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 9:50PM PST until January 01 at 1:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 1 PM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 6000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches from 6,000 to 7,000 feet and 3 to 6 inches from 7,000 to 8,000 feet. Winds gusting from 20 to 40 mph. * WHERE...San Bernardino County Mountains. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 1 PM Sunday. * IMPACTS...Ice and snow covered roads in the higher elevations could make travel difficult on New Year`s Day, especially in the morning when temperatures will be at or below freezing. Fog will also reduce visibility at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.
